attributes.action: prevent the sale of the British share in the Channel Tunnel Rail Link
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The CTRL, under London & Continental Railways is proposed for sale by the UK Government. This would leave the UK under threat from competition we cannot stop as we have no stake in the link, such as DB through services. Britain should maintain its interest in the CTRL and guide it carefully.
